caption.p: Typical galvanostatic charge–discharge potential profiles for the 1st and 2nd cycle at 1 C rate for ( a) pristine CNT–LNMO, ( b) pre-lithiated CNT-LNMO, ( c) galvanostatic charge–discharge profiles of pre-lithiated CNT–LNMO at 2 C rate, ( d) cycling performance of the pristine and pre-lithiated CNT anodes in the full-cell configuration.
